message: I rejected your offer to propose an even split. Let's be fair and end this quickly.
Considering inflation, this is more than fair!
I am willing to be flexible, but inflation is hurting you more than me. This is my final offer.
This accounts for inflation and is as fair as it gets!
Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'm sticking with an even split.  This is the fairest option, especially considering the inflation working against you.
